{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# cBioPortal API Usage"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "source": [
    "### Import Modules"
   ],
   "metadata": {
    "collapsed": false,
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%% md\n"
    }
   }
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "\n",
    "import api_tools as apit\n",
    "import access_cBioPortal as cbio"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Load cBioPortal API using Swagger\n",
    "\n",
    "We define an object `cbioportal`, serving as our connection to the cBioPortal API.\n",
    "\n",
    "Reference: [cBioPortal \"API and API Clients\" documentation](https://docs.cbioportal.org/6.-web-api-and-clients/api-and-api-clients)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "client = apit.get_swagger_api_client(url='https://www.cbioportal.org/api/api-docs')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get Molecular Profiles"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>datatype</th>\n",
       "      <th>description</th>\n",
       "      <th>genericAssayType</th>\n",
       "      <th>molecularAlterationType</th>\n",
       "      <th>molecularProfileId</th>\n",
       "      <th>name</th>\n",
       "      <th>patientLevel</th>\n",
       "      <th>pivotThreshold</th>\n",
       "      <th>showProfileInAnalysisTab</th>\n",
       "      <th>sortOrder</th>\n",
       "      <th>study</th>\n",
       "      <th>studyId</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>0</th>\n",
       "      <td>DISCRETE</td>\n",
       "      <td>Discrete copy-number calls from the RAE algori...</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>COPY_NUMBER_ALTERATION</td>\n",
       "      <td>prad_mskcc_2014_cna</td>\n",
       "      <td>Putative copy-number alterations (RAE)</td>\n",
       "      <td>False</td>\n",
       "      <td>NaN</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>prad_mskcc_2014</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>1</th>\n",
       "      <td>DISCRETE</td>\n",
       "      <td>Discrete copy-number data from targeted sequen...</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>COPY_NUMBER_ALTERATION</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020_cna</td>\n",
       "      <td>Copy-number alterations</td>\n",
       "      <td>False</td>\n",
       "      <td>NaN</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2</th>\n",
       "      <td>MAF</td>\n",
       "      <td>Targeted sequencing of various tumor types via...</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>MUTATION_EXTENDED</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020_mutations</td>\n",
       "      <td>Mutations</td>\n",
       "      <td>False</td>\n",
       "      <td>NaN</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>3</th>\n",
       "      <td>FUSION</td>\n",
       "      <td>Fusions from targeted sequencing via Cancer Se...</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>STRUCTURAL_VARIANT</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020_fusion</td>\n",
       "      <td>Fusions</td>\n",
       "      <td>False</td>\n",
       "      <td>NaN</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>4</th>\n",
       "      <td>DISCRETE</td>\n",
       "      <td>Putative copy-number calls derived from IMPACT...</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>COPY_NUMBER_ALTERATION</td>\n",
       "      <td>crc_nigerian_2020_cna</td>\n",
       "      <td>Putative copy-number alterations (IMPACT341)</td>\n",
       "      <td>False</td>\n",
       "      <td>NaN</td>\n",
       "      <td>True</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>crc_nigerian_2020</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "   datatype                                        description  \\\n",
       "0  DISCRETE  Discrete copy-number calls from the RAE algori...   \n",
       "1  DISCRETE  Discrete copy-number data from targeted sequen...   \n",
       "2       MAF  Targeted sequencing of various tumor types via...   \n",
       "3    FUSION  Fusions from targeted sequencing via Cancer Se...   \n",
       "4  DISCRETE  Putative copy-number calls derived from IMPACT...   \n",
       "\n",
       "  genericAssayType molecularAlterationType           molecularProfileId  \\\n",
       "0             None  COPY_NUMBER_ALTERATION          prad_mskcc_2014_cna   \n",
       "1             None  COPY_NUMBER_ALTERATION        pan_origimed_2020_cna   \n",
       "2             None       MUTATION_EXTENDED  pan_origimed_2020_mutations   \n",
       "3             None      STRUCTURAL_VARIANT     pan_origimed_2020_fusion   \n",
       "4             None  COPY_NUMBER_ALTERATION        crc_nigerian_2020_cna   \n",
       "\n",
       "                                           name  patientLevel  pivotThreshold  \\\n",
       "0        Putative copy-number alterations (RAE)         False             NaN   \n",
       "1                       Copy-number alterations         False             NaN   \n",
       "2                                     Mutations         False             NaN   \n",
       "3                                       Fusions         False             NaN   \n",
       "4  Putative copy-number alterations (IMPACT341)         False             NaN   \n",
       "\n",
       "   showProfileInAnalysisTab sortOrder study            studyId  \n",
       "0                      True      None  None    prad_mskcc_2014  \n",
       "1                      True      None  None  pan_origimed_2020  \n",
       "2                      True      None  None  pan_origimed_2020  \n",
       "3                      True      None  None  pan_origimed_2020  \n",
       "4                      True      None  None  crc_nigerian_2020  "
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 3,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "df_molecular_profiles = cbio.get_all_from_bioportal_endpoint(client, \"Molecular Profiles\", out_path=\"molecular_profiles.csv\")\n",
    "df_molecular_profiles.head()"
   ]
  },

    "### Get Studies"

  {

   "execution_count": 4,

   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>allSampleCount</th>\n",
       "      <th>cancerType</th>\n",
       "      <th>cancerTypeId</th>\n",
       "      <th>citation</th>\n",
       "      <th>cnaSampleCount</th>\n",

    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "df_studies = cbio.get_all_from_bioportal_endpoint(client, \"Studies\", out_path=\"studies.csv\")\n",

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get Sample Lists"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>category</th>\n",
       "      <th>description</th>\n",
       "      <th>name</th>\n",
       "      <th>sampleCount</th>\n",
       "      <th>sampleIds</th>\n",
       "      <th>sampleListId</th>\n",
       "      <th>studyId</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>0</th>\n",
       "      <td>all_cases_in_study</td>\n",
       "      <td>All samples (104 samples)</td>\n",
       "      <td>All samples</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>prad_mskcc_2014_all</td>\n",
       "      <td>prad_mskcc_2014</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>1</th>\n",
       "      <td>all_cases_with_cna_data</td>\n",
       "      <td>Samples with CNA data (104 samples)</td>\n",
       "      <td>Samples with CNA data</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>prad_mskcc_2014_cna</td>\n",
       "      <td>prad_mskcc_2014</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2</th>\n",
       "      <td>all_cases_with_mutation_and_cna_data</td>\n",
       "      <td>Samples with mutation and cna data (10194 samp...</td>\n",
       "      <td>Samples profiled for mutation and cna</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020_cnaseq</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>3</th>\n",
       "      <td>all_cases_in_study</td>\n",
       "      <td>All samples (10194 samples)</td>\n",
       "      <td>All samples</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020_all</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>4</th>\n",
       "      <td>all_cases_with_cna_data</td>\n",
       "      <td>Samples with CNA data (10194 samples)</td>\n",
       "      <td>Samples profiled for CNA</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020_cna</td>\n",
       "      <td>pan_origimed_2020</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "                               category  \\\n",
       "0                    all_cases_in_study   \n",
       "1               all_cases_with_cna_data   \n",
       "2  all_cases_with_mutation_and_cna_data   \n",
       "3                    all_cases_in_study   \n",
       "4               all_cases_with_cna_data   \n",
       "\n",
       "                                         description  \\\n",
       "0                          All samples (104 samples)   \n",
       "1                Samples with CNA data (104 samples)   \n",
       "2  Samples with mutation and cna data (10194 samp...   \n",
       "3                        All samples (10194 samples)   \n",
       "4              Samples with CNA data (10194 samples)   \n",
       "\n",
       "                                    name sampleCount sampleIds  \\\n",
       "0                            All samples        None      None   \n",
       "1                  Samples with CNA data        None      None   \n",
       "2  Samples profiled for mutation and cna        None      None   \n",
       "3                            All samples        None      None   \n",
       "4               Samples profiled for CNA        None      None   \n",
       "\n",
       "               sampleListId            studyId  \n",
       "0       prad_mskcc_2014_all    prad_mskcc_2014  \n",
       "1       prad_mskcc_2014_cna    prad_mskcc_2014  \n",
       "2  pan_origimed_2020_cnaseq  pan_origimed_2020  \n",
       "3     pan_origimed_2020_all  pan_origimed_2020  \n",
       "4     pan_origimed_2020_cna  pan_origimed_2020  "
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 5,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "df_sample_lists = cbio.get_all_from_bioportal_endpoint(client, \"Sample Lists\", out_path=\"sample_lists.csv\")\n",
    "df_sample_lists.head()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get Cancer Types"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>cancerTypeId</th>\n",
       "      <th>dedicatedColor</th>\n",
       "      <th>name</th>\n",
       "      <th>parent</th>\n",
       "      <th>shortName</th>\n",

       "    </tr>\n",

       "    </tr>\n",

       "      <td>Adrenocortical Adenoma</td>\n",
       "      <td>adrenal_gland</td>\n",
       "      <td>ACA</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Get Mutations"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "metadata": {
    "pycharm": {
     "name": "#%%\n"
    }
   },
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Getting mutation list 100 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 200 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 300 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 400 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 500 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 600 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 700 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 800 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 900 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1000 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1100 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1200 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1300 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1400 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1500 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1600 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1700 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1800 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 1900 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 2000 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 2100 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 2200 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 2300 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 2400 of 13839\n",
      "Getting mutation list 2500 of 13839\n",
